duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee a team of 3-4 warehouse workers.
Work well with others by first seeking to understand and then be understood.
Unite, be organized, multi-task, and communicate well with others.
Manage warehouse in compliance with company's policies and vision.
Oversee receiving, warehousing, production, inventory management, distribution, and maintenance operations.
Set up layout and ensure efficient space utilization.
Direct receiving, warehousing, and distribution operations.
Oversee the efficient receipt, storage, value-adding servicing, and dispatch of a wide variety of products.
Ensure productivity targets are achieved and that all warehouse processes are running smoothly and promptly.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or a related field (Master's preferred)
